metadata.title: CVE-2023-2233 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper authorization issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions starting from 11.8 before 16.2.8, all versionsstarting from 16.3 before 16.3.5 and all versions starting from 16.4 before16.4.1. It allows a project reporter to leak the owner's Sentry instanceprojects.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
